title: Fees, financial aid and protest action Released: 20h30, 18 October 2015 (University of Cape Town) ...
text: ( Source : University of Cape Town ) Dear colleagues and students The recent student demonstrations nationwide are of concern to us all. In many instances these protest actions bring focus to critical issues affecting the higher education
